HGNC to Ensembl Gene ID Mappings

Source: R/hgnc2gene.R
hgnc2gene.Rd

HGNC to Ensembl Gene ID Mappings

hgnc2gene()

Value

data.frame

See also

Other Gene Annotation Functions: annotable, broadClass, convertGenesToSymbols, convertTranscriptsToGenes, convertUCSCBuildToEnsembl, detectOrganism, emptyRanges, makeGRangesFromEnsembl, makeGRangesFromGFF, makeGene2symbolFromEnsembl, makeGene2symbolFromGFF, makeTx2geneFromEnsembl, makeTx2geneFromGFF, mgi2gene, panther, stripTranscriptVersions

Examples

x <- hgnc2gene()
#> Obtaining HGNC to Ensembl gene ID mappings
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   .default = col_character(),
#>   date_approved_reserved = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_symbol_changed = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_name_changed = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_modified = col_date(format = ""),
#>   entrez_id = col_integer(),
#>   homeodb = col_integer(),
#>   orphanet = col_integer()
#> )
#> See spec(...) for full column specifications.
#>
